Data Dictionary.station_id: Unique identifier for the tide station
Data Dictionary.station_abbreviation: Abbreviated name of the tide station
Data Dictionary.datetime: Date and time of the water level measurement
Data Dictionary.acqua_alta: Flag indicating if the water level was considered an 'acqua alta' event (> 110 cm)
